item.title: Python development workflow with Neovim and Jupyter-lab
item.description: I want to expand on the previous post Getting started with nvim touching upon the jupyter-lab integration. I am still unpleased with the current solution, but the following trick addresses a couple of issues. Jupyter-lab comes with an IPython interpreter, which in turn has an auto-reload extension. It can be enabled easily as: %load_ext autoreload %autoreload 2 The magic command set to “2” reloads every module before any code is executed.
